other_tests.findings: Prolonged QTc interval of 600 ms and polymorphic ventricular tachyarrhythmias were documented.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initially, the ECG showed sinus rhythm without QTc prolongation; subsequently, a prolonged QTc interval was found that persisted.

other_tests.findings: A missense mutation (Ala1330Pro) in the SCN5A gene was identified, which was absent in both parents, suggesting a de novo origin.
An abnormal migration pattern in exon 23 of the SCN5A gene was identified.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequent analyses confirmed the absence of this mutation in the parents.
